text:
You remember how brilliant Ajay Devgn starrer Raid was, well, the songs of the movie were powerful too. Hailed as the most layered song from the album, Jhuk Na Paunga was a song that made the audience emotional.
And now giving it a rap twist, the cover of the song is equally brilliant. To inspire you to work hard and never give up, this song is perfect to keep you motivated on a weekday!
Listen in.
title: This Rap Rendition Of ‘Jhuk Na Paunga’ Will Inspire You To Work Hard And Never Give Up!
description: Just like how the brilliant Ajay Devgn starrer Rai was, the songs of the movie were powerful too. Hailed as the most layered song from the album, Jhuk Na Paunga was a song that made the audiences emotional. Giving it a rap twist, this cover of the song is equally brilliant too. To inspire you to work hard and never give up, this song is perfect to keep you motivated on Monday!
